events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer role from the candidate and it is now under review.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on the candidate's experience and resume keywords.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide the candidate through the recruitment process.
Completed the initial screening call with the candidate to discuss their background, experience, and motivations for joining.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the initial screening feedback and expressed eagerness to proceed.
Scheduled a technical interview with the candidate to assess their software engineering skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong coding skills and system design knowledge.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's cultural fit, salary expectations, and other HR-related topics.
Completed the HR interview successfully; the candidate showed excellent communication skills and alignment with company values.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including the salary package, benefits, and job role details.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The candidate accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date, excited to begin their new role as Software Engineer.
Onboarding process has started for the candidate, including system access setup, team introductions, and initial training plans.
The hiring process is officially closed. The candidate has been successfully onboarded into the engineering department.
